snippet.title: I See Red - Official Teaser Trailer 3
snippet.description:
I See Red is an upcoming roguelite twin-stick shooter in which Humans, Robots and Aliens will stand in your way as you rage through different spaceships to find your revenge. Experiment with a multitude of tactics and fighting styles thanks to the many available weapons, varied level design, destructible environment, various skill combinations, grappling hook, and more!

WISHLIST now on Steam: https://bit.ly/ISR-Steam-Teaser
#ISeeRed #Whiteboard #Gameforge

More of I See Red at: https://iseeredgame.com/
https://twitter.com/ISeeRedGame
https://www.instagram.com/iseeredgame/
https://www.facebook.com/ISeeRedGame
